name: personalized-tourist-planner
title: Personalized Tourist Planner
description: AI-powered actor that generates personalized tourist itineraries for Indian destinations using real-time data scraping and LLM optimization. Creates optimized day-by-day plans with cost breakdowns, accommodation suggestions, and risk assessments.

changes: Initial release of Personalized Tourist Planner Actor
AI-powered itinerary generation with Claude 3.5 Sonnet or GPT-4o
Support for 14 vehicle types and 12 user preferences
